author: deluckybrick
title: Good for a race or two.
review:
As always, I will recommend that you race these head to head with the two cars already included, or with others you have.

Pros:
Cool paint for the cars.
Two cars, so start your engines!

Cons:
The ramp is included, but the cars wont jump.

This set gets an 8 because the cars cant jump.

author: reidak49
title: ok
review: i dont rember much about this set there is not the pull back motor works but not to well the minifigures have no body! as you can see nice helmets i dont think i build the ramp and the racer cant jump that high

author: gryphon
title: Fragile Go-Karts
review:
I think, I've got this set as a present in 2002 or 2003. It is really nasty and the pullback motors aren't that strong. Both cars are build similar and have the same motor. But I think, one of them is a little stronger. The ramp is weak and  has only a 2x2-feet with a round plate with a roundes bottom (2654 on bricklink).

The "minifigs" have only a big head and a really minuscule body. That doesn't make sense and looks really bad. The small bodies are probably the worst part of this set.
Pro:
Useful wheels

Contra:
Bodies are too small
Poor motors
Fragile cars

author: jamhool46
title: Best mini set
review:
This was one of my first Drome sets. And I love it!
Just how they rocket everywhere!

  • PROS
Cars
Colors
Alternative models
Jump

  • CONS
NONE!!


I give it a solid 10 if you have the money don't hesitate to buy.
